law.catch_line: Immunity for action of military courts.
law.text: All persons acting under the provisions of this code, whether as a member of the military or as a civilian, shall be immune from any personal liability for any of the acts or omissions which they did or failed to do as part of their duties under this code.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 148, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 82, effective July 1, 1954.
